level.heading: Injunctive relief.
level.text: A resident, a representative of a resident, the ombudsman, or the Attorney General may bring an action in court for a temporary restraining order, preliminary injunction, or permanent injunction to enjoin a long-term care facility from violating a provision of subchapter II or III of this chapter or any rule issued by the Mayor pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-321 substituted "Attorney General" for "Corporation Counsel".
